extendedInfo.description: The Cisco Technical Support mobile application provides access to Cisco's rich technical support content. Find solutions to your troubleshooting needs anywhere, anytime!Support contract owners can create, manage, and update their support cases all from your mobile device. Whether you need to pick-up a co-worker's case, or you need extra flexibility in managing your own cases, you can always contact your TAC Engineer, get access to RMA details, or track your RMA Shipments all from your Android device!Leverage the Support Communities to ask and answer questions in the discussion forums, comment on blogs, rate videos, and share documents about configuring and troubleshooting Cisco products and solutions. Interact with support professionals and Cisco customers with the right expertise and the right technology domains via community profiles and member leaderboards (list of top community contributors).Research Cisco products and services through mobile optimized content, videos and podcasts.  Whether troubleshooting vpn or firewall issues, researching the latest features on our UCS, ISR, ASR, or Nexus products, or downloading configuration guides for our Catalyst switches or ASA firewall appliances, Cisco is with you every step of the way.FEATURES: Manage Cases (requires a valid support contract): - Access to any Cisco service requests associated with your contracts via Search- Ability to open either a P3 or P4 case on devices whose serial number is associated with your contracts.- Ability to request recently closed cases to be re-opened - Click to connect with your TAC Engineer directly via phone or email - Add notes and photos to your support case - Access to all support case notes and a summary of attached files - Send a request for a status update, or to close your support case - View RMA details associated with your support cases - Up to date tracking information for Replacement RMA parts from the courier- Initiate RMA returns for devices to be sent back to Cisco- Click to call the On-Site Contact and Field Engineer via phone or email for related RMAs. Don't have a Cisco support contract? Learn more about the benefits here: http://www.cisco.com/web/help/reg/ben/sc_ben.html Cisco Support Communities: - Access to Cisco Technical Support discussion threads including five new Global Communities (Polish, Japanese, Spanish, Portuguese & Russian)- Track your activities under My Activities for quick access to discussions you have started and replied to- Email discussion threads to anyone - Save discussion threads for offline viewing - Social interaction with the Cisco Technical Support Community - View overall and mobile leaderboards of the top community contributors Online Media: - Cisco RSS feeds and alerts help you stay up to date with news  and security updates- Keep informed and stay updated via technical support videos presented by Cisco Experts - Access to Cisco Technical Support Podcasts Product Information: - Mobile optimized Cisco Product and Services documentation

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great app
reviews.author: Eric Julius

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Helpfull and keep forward
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useful when on the move
reviews.comment: Great app if you need to check or update your tac case quick when out of the office.
reviews.author: Vern Lubbe

reviews.title: Great application..
reviews.comment: Very helpful
reviews.author: abhishek gupta

reviews.title: Use this at least once a day
reviews.comment: As a person who works with Cisco\'s SmartCare product everyday, this app is now part of my working life. Sometimes, I need to start a case for a customer who has a 4-hour SLA and simply can\'t get back to my desk or boot up my laptop to start a TAC case. This app allows me to start, finish and resolve a case without ever touching a physical keyboard. I haven\'t tried any of the features listed in the latest update, but I\'m sure I will, given my past reliance on it.   Note: I have used the IOS version of this app more extensively. Recently switched to an Android phone.
reviews.author: Joseph Pumphrey

reviews.title: Authentication works now
reviews.comment: Problem fixed. Thanks
reviews.author: Erick Pardio

reviews.title: Makes support easier
reviews.comment: I use this all the time. Not that I have a lot of problems with Cisco, but it\'s a great app to stay updated.
reviews.author: Arne Ost

reviews.title: Authentication Error
reviews.comment: I tried login but getting error\"User could not be authentcated\", please advise
reviews.author: Nasaruddin Mulla

reviews.title: Nice multi-use app
reviews.comment: Some useful shortcuts and functions
reviews.author: Amel Hodzic

reviews.title: Permission
reviews.comment: Is it really required to read phone state?
reviews.author: Adrian Schmid

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.comment: Very useful app for TAC communications. Has enough to communicate on an issue. Wish Cisco would publish more podcasts and epub format documentation!
reviews.author: Martin Terry

reviews.title: My comments:
reviews.comment: A very good app so far,  but I would like to see the following: -TAC case history - for closed cases for reference.  - Optimize for tablet screens -  the font size is way too small all around.  - Can you please add a dark theme for this application?  Thank you.
reviews.author: Larry Brown

reviews.title: Pretty cool!
reviews.comment: Clean, simple, easy - I like it!  Although, not sure why GPS, Phone calls or Discover known accounts permissions are required. Only use what you absolutely need Cisco - no evil data mining!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Updated
reviews.comment: Login issues appear to be fixed. Updated interface cleans up the main screen. Easy to use app enables on-the-go use of Cisco support forums and access to many other told such as videos and support case updates.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cannot connect to the server
reviews.comment: Last update fixed any issue with the authentication. It seems OK now, a decent app for what it does
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Won\'t log in
reviews.comment: I\'m sure the app would be good if it worked.  I can log in through any number of web browsers without issue, but try to log in through the app and forget it.  Really unfortunate, I bet it would be handy.  EDIT:  The application is now working correctly!!!  I\'m logged in and finding what I need.  Thanks so much for resolving this issue!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect after recent update
reviews.comment: Great concept but unfortunately it\'s not displaying any of my tac cases. I\'ll up my rating once this works.  Or should I put a case in for it :p update: the recent update has fixed the SR not displaying for some users.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Tablet Optimized version would be great
reviews.comment: For example:  I noticed on a colleague\'s iPad that while he\'s browsing the communities there is a list of threads along the left part of the screen.  When he selects a message the right side displays the message.  All in all a solid app - keep up the great work!
reviews.author: Bill Watts

reviews.title: Uninstalling this app
reviews.comment: I receive a login authentication error.  This would be a useful app if I could login to use it.  I have tried uninstalling and reinstalling to no avail.
reviews.author: Anika Brice

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Having fixed previous issues the app works great - would give it 5 * if you could amend the cc list on the TAC case
reviews.author: A Google User
